posts.post_content:
In an ideal world where flavor text doesn't have to answer to limits of physical space, I'd have wanted a nicely symmetrical long form of this card's flavor text:
  
   
*The oil created the Spore; the Spore created Mirrodin. Mirrodin created the mycosynth, the mycosynth created New Phyrexia.*

posts.post_content: It *just* occurred to me last night while tinking around with a possible white metalcraft build - the real purpose of the Wellsprings is to build up resistant metalcraft. You get a cheap artifact towards metalcraft and either a land or a card, and if the enemy wants to shut off metalcraft, you at least get something in return as well.
